alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:03PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broadwater, northeastern Madison, southeastern Jefferson and west central Gallatin Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 702 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm centered near Pony, or 16 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Harrison, Pony, Willow Creek and Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
